Hangar Link Connect is a companion extension for the Web Application https://hangar.link

This is an extension that helps you get your data from your Star Citizen Hangar on https://robertsspaceindustries.com and view your data on https://hangar.link.

This extension allows https://hangar.link to query your Star Citizen pledge data including Price Data, Pledge Data and Buyback data allowing it to present the data within the https://hangar.link app where you can search, filter, and display your data.
